channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4397] AT Production//Share a product message is in French
item.description:
when tested the Share product functionality on 2 diffrent products, on www.distrelec.at the Messages received were in

  • German for this product - http://www.distrelec.at/de/Laborstecker-%C3%B8-4-mm-Multi-Contact-LS-4/p/14048007
  • French for this one - http://www.distrelec.at/de/Kontaktfett-Spray-Spray-200-ml-Electrolube-SGB-SPRAY%2C-CH-DE/p/11040786?q=kontaktreiniger&filter_Category3=Reiniger%2C+Schmiermittel+und+Schutzlack&filter_Chemische+Funktion=Kontaktreiniger&filter_Lieferform=Spray&page=9&origPos=14&origPageSize=10&simi=90.88
item.summary: AT Production//Share a product message is in French

comments.comment: Tested it quickly: I received the emails from both of the above linked products from the AT shop in Italian.
The problem occurs only with anonymous user.
fixed
This issue applies as well on Share your cart Feature.
Fixed (the fix applies for sharing product, cart, category, search, etc. )
In Lithuania: Share the Cart is in German

attachment.name: 2014-06-17 12_11_00-Explorer_ Nabil Benothman@10.191.20.141_master_9001_ Type - hybris Management Co.png
attachment.author: nbenothman

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4396] Property key Sweden
item.description: Please here you find the reviewed property keys for Norway. To be uploaded into the test environment.

comments.comment: fixed
The properties should be available after the next Q deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4395] Conversion tracking issue
item.description:
The trackings (Webtrekk, Ensighten etc) on the converison page is not working anymore since last week.
Our teams for Google Tracking and Webtrekk have no data anymore.

comments.comment: See last comment in DISTRELEC-3568 - looks like this is the same issue
still not working in Chrome on www.distrelec.ch, see printscreen

done!

I've also updated this directly on test!

Please test and let me know if I should do this on PROD as well.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4389] LT// B2C Guest Order - not found in SAP
item.description:
I ordered as guest. I chose to pick up the good, and I chose pre-payment.

I received the order confirmation number from Hybris. (in the link of the page)

Order confirmation number from SAP not received

Order confirmation E-Mail not received

Order nor received in SAP P
item.summary: LT// B2C Guest Order - not found in SAP

comments.comment: issue reported by Tomas, and reproduced as in the attachment.

Hello Raphael,
Could you please check that?

ERROR [SapOrderCalculationService] SOAP error while calling method 'if11OrderCalculation' on SAP PI interface:
faultstring = 'Server Error', faultText = 'SAP ERR:AM,053 :Specify either address number or address handle'.
ERROR [SapCheckoutService] Can not place order in SAP.
order has been place with SAP order number 0074768201

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4375] Breadcrumb: Page identifier doesn't match with page title
item.description:
e.g. on this page:
http://www.distrelec.it/manufacturer

The page title is "Produttori", however the breadcrumb identifier is named "Produttore". It should be the same as the page title (and normally on other pages it is)

Another example (http://prod.distrelec.dk.distrelec.com/da/cms/catalog-order) in the attached screenshots.
item.summary: Breadcrumb: Page identifier doesn't match with page title

comments.comment:
Problem description: For special pages (manaufacturer stores, cart, homepage, login, etc.) a specific property is used.
Solution: Use the localized page title instead of a property. Fix that for all "special pages".

UPDATE AbstractPage;uid[unique=true];title[lang=en];title[lang=de];title[lang=fr];title[lang=it];title[lang=lt];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]
;homepage;Best webshop for Electronics;Bester Online Shop für Elektronik;Meilleur magasin en ligne  pour l'électronique;;;distrelec_CHContentCatalog:Staged

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4323] Direct Order Suggest Layer: Prices not showing
item.description:
In the direct order suggest layer, currently on the Q system the prices are not showing. Sometimes also the article number are not showing.

  • CH Chrome, Safari: prices and article number not showing
  • CH Firefox: article number showing, price not showing
  • AT, IT, LT Chrome Safari Firefox: article number showing, price not showing.

Is this an FE problem, or is the information not passed along from the FactFinder on the Q system?
item.summary: Direct Order Suggest Layer: Prices not showing

comments.comment: Raphael, might this be an FF problem and possibly only occur on Q?
Prices still not showing in LT! In the other countries it is ok.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4286] RMA request missing
item.description:
There aren't any new RMA request since 23.05.
Today we have sent out a request for the following user: 39782ad5-9750-4954-a02d-c37eb797822d

comments.comment: As discussed, can you please make the change in the R2.0 please?
Test ok for fr_CH, de_CH, IT and AT
fixed
Please modify the check for Phone, Mobile and Fax.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4174] Availability facet is not working correctly, because of a change in the FF export
item.description:
The instock value has chnaged from a boolean to the values 0,1,3. In that case the facet is not longer a boolean.
Change the facet to a multiselect facet, which displays the availability for the default/alternative warehouse like:

  • Available in 24h (200)
  • Available in 72h (68)
item.summary: Availability facet is not working correctly, because of a change in the FF export

comments.comment:
As discussed with Florian:

  • please remove the avilability facet for R2.0.
  • please analyze/fix after the LT rollout.
Ready for upload.
integration done

Hi Nabil

on test.distrelec.dk the properties are not translated

Hi,

the translations are in the v2.1 and the current version deployed on the Q system is the v2.0.x.
fixed

attachment.name: Distrelec Danmark _ (da)Best Online Shop for Electronics - Internet Explorer.png
attachment.author: oilie

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4095] FF Availability Info: Additional status, checkbox instead of radio
item.description:
• Due to a change in of the FF export, the availability now has one more status:
    • available in primary warehouse
    • available in secondary warehouse
  • therefore, the availability facet should be changed
    • from a single readion button
    • -> to two checkboxes.
    • -> also the facet should remain visible after a filter is selected. (also see DISTRELEC-3210)
item.summary: FF Availability Info: Additional status, checkbox instead of radio

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3830] Different drop shippment stock for ITA
item.description:
The stock of drop shippment items for Italy should be different to Switzerland/Austria.
For that reason we need a specific ITA-stock import for local drop shippment "Streckenartikel" products.

We only will get this file (erp_stock-D3P273)once a day.
item.summary: Different drop shippment stock for ITA

comments.comment: Define Warehouse with Raphael Leu.

The Warehouses should be named:
-EFIT
-ESIT
Further clarification needed, Florian will update with results and next steps, if needed.

Please implement as discussed.
Priorization Logic.

comments.comment: @Cornel: It has happen again. So I thought to open this ticket to analyse it in more deep.

Unfortunately we were not able to reproduce this error on a development environment. However, we identified a code sequence were a local session is created but not removed anyomore. This issue was fixed.

Please reopen the ticket if the error occurs again.

Error occured again (in version 1.0.4). Code change mentioned above (executeInLocalView) did not solve the problem.

HP-Q: (Import was running for 13h 19m 41s)

07 Feb 2014 13:56:39 WARN  [task-scheduler-2] [JaloSession] Could not remove JaloSession JaloSession: (master/s849450673072,USERUID:admin) from http session 9EEA0FF20E91B411E04E32347E60CBDB since http session is not current one (current is null)
07 Feb 2014 13:56:39 WARN  [task-scheduler-2] [JaloSession] There are some active local session contexts left (1) for tenant master, this might indicate there are not properly freed localsession context instances.
07 Feb 2014 13:56:39 ERROR [task-scheduler-2] [FlexibleSearch] Flexiblesearch error: could not translate value expression 'session.catalogversions'
07 Feb 2014 13:56:39 ERROR [task-scheduler-2] [FlexibleSearch] query was 'SELECT DISTINCT {item:pk} FROM {CategoryCategoryRelation* AS rel JOIN Category AS item ON {rel:target}={item:pk} } WHERE {rel:qualifier} = 'CategoryCategoryRelation' AND {rel:language} IS NULL  AND {rel:source} IN ( ?pklist )'

HP-P: (Import was running for 01h 48m 28s)

07 Feb 2014 13:22:21 WARN  [hybrisHTTP320] [10.192.130.91] [JaloSession] Could not remove JaloSession JaloSession: (master/s849578776721,USERUID:anonymous) from http session 2DBBFF6A38A7814E056EB22A4D906F6F since http session is not current one (current is B68E6496AE6C6407C422A48D673C2322)
07 Feb 2014 13:22:21 WARN  [hybrisHTTP320] [10.192.130.91] [JaloSession] Could not remove JaloSession JaloSession: (master/s849679379792,USERUID:anonymous) from http session A8626C524B5E2C270F047E404B2077BF since http session is not current one (current is B68E6496AE6C6407C422A48D673C2322)
07 Feb 2014 13:22:21 WARN  [hybrisHTTP320] [10.192.130.91] [JaloSession] Could not remove JaloSession JaloSession: (master/s849586486160,USERUID:marc.kraft) from http session F120F554A5E5E6F8331BE374A72D59E1 since http session is not current one (current is B68E6496AE6C6407C422A48D673C2322)
07 Feb 2014 13:22:21 WARN  [hybrisHTTP320] [10.192.130.91] [JaloSession] Could not remove JaloSession JaloSession: (master/s849578777408,USERUID:anonymous) from http session 2245D2264B2A9757937FF2A088BC2770 since http session is not current one (current is B68E6496AE6C6407C422A48D673C2322)
07 Feb 2014 13:22:21 WARN  [task-scheduler-2] [JaloSession] There are some active local session contexts left (3) for tenant master, this might indicate there are not properly freed localsession context instances.
07 Feb 2014 13:22:22 ERROR [task-scheduler-2] [FlexibleSearch] Flexiblesearch error: could not translate value expression 'session.catalogversions'
07 Feb 2014 13:22:22 ERROR [task-scheduler-2] [FlexibleSearch] query was 'SELECT {c:pk} FROM {Product AS c} WHERE {c:code}=?code '

The reason for losing the session in case of HP-Q is unknown. => so I reopen this ticket.
But in the HP-P case, we know the reason for losing the session. (Raphael used the "delete all JaloSessions" functionality in the hAC and did not considered this side effect.)
Any further action needed here?
@Raphael: Have you already created a hybris ticket for this issue?

I started asking questions about this seldom session behavior in https://jira.hybris.com/browse/SUP-11740.
The import was running the whole weekend without having this session problem! On Monday 02:02:00 we lost the session again. Maybe the problem is related to other activities that are not there during the weekend? (e.g. ERP import)
As of version v1.1.18 we use a distinct hybris user (technicalPIMImportUser instead of admin) to run the PIM import. This might have an impact on this issue.
Will be verified once v2.0 is in production.

Is this still an issue?
Are there any todos left on this topic?
Yes, it's still a problem.
@Raphael: Since the problem now appeared during a CSV import, too - I suggest to consult hybris for this problem. Can you please contact hybris?

17 Jun 2014 11:49:18 WARN [task-scheduler-8] [JaloSession] There are some active local session contexts left (1) for tenant master, this might indicate there are not properly freed localsession context instances.
